content: At the Tribeca House property, where new leases in the third quarter exceeded $83 per square foot, more than 23% better than the previous rents consistent with our trend in the previous quarter, causing the average of all leases to increase to a record $71 per square foot from $67 per square foot at the end of June, $65 per square foot at the end of March and $63 per square foot at the end of December.
